name: Pinchy Gardenlegs
description:
Submission for Weekly Game Jam 97 - "Strange Garden"
Prototype for a game where you plant seeds and harvest crops, but the crops grow legs and starts running all over the place.

You start out with 100 coins, which you can spend it to buy tomatie seeds for 15 coins from the Seeds button on the right, or Nets for 10 coins from the Tool button on the left.
Clicking on tomatie seeds will let you place and grow a tomatie crop. Once its grown, it will start growing random numbers of tomaties, and when they're done growing, click on them to pop them off the crops.
The tomaties will start running in a random direction, click to catch and harvest them!

Nets will stop any tomaties that walks across it several times until it breaks.

For now you can only plant tomaties and place nets, there's no real end or failure states.
